thread.title: Bulk Oil Distributors release pricing formula
thread.title_full: Bulk Oil Distributors release pricing formula

title: Bulk Oil Distributors release pricing formula
text:
16 July 2015 17:36 CET Bulk Oil Distributors release pricing formula By Myjoyonline.com 
Bulk Oil Distributors have released the formula used in pricing petroleum products. 
The methodology that will be released every week, will let consumers appreciate and understand what goes into pricing petroleum products. 
Click here for the methodology used in pricing petroleum products.
